src.util package¶

Submodules¶

  • src.util.alphabet_chars module
  • src.util.augmentation_util module
  • src.util.eval_util module
  • src.util.phoc_util module
  • src.util.representation_util module
  • src.util.sanity_util module

Module contents¶

This package contains many useful methods, to deal with:

  • extracting all characters of any feasible alphabet (alphabet_chars)

  • augmentation of images (augemntation_util)

  • evaluation of word-spotting (eval_util)

  • creation of PHOC and evaluation of the WER and CER (phoc_util)

  • better representation of JSON-file-contents (representation_util)

  • sanity of file paths (sanity_util)
